text: Ihor Yaroslavovych Lahoyda (; born 23 August 1978) is a Ukrainian football coach and a former player. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Lviv (1992) players Category:FC Dynamo-2 Kyiv players Category:FC Dynamo-3 Kyiv players Category:FC Hoverla Uzhhorod players Category:FC Elista players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Zirka-2 Kirovohrad players Category:FC Polissya Zhytomyr players Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC Inter Boyarka players Category:FC Yednist Plysky players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Ihor Lahoyda
